title: Ariella and the Blood Curse
description: Ariella Lightharbour is heir to the throne with a kingdom at her feet, but knows sheâ€™s meant for more. Forsaking her throne she chooses to become a Guardian. As she embarks on The Journey she must find the courage to battle the deadly Ghost Raiders that murdered her father, discover the identity of the elusive shadow and fight to end the Blood Curse that threatens to overwhelm the land.
author: Owen Crane
